CMBToken.rule: throw if the _from account has not deliberately authorized the sender of the message via some mechanism
CMBToken.fn_interface: function transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success)

CMBToken.rule: not throw if Transfers of 0 values
CMBToken.fn_interface: function transferFrom(address _from, address _to, uint256 _value) public returns (bool success)
